site_name: Former Watch Tower House And Kingdom Hall SitesThe RidgewayLondonNW7 1RS
description: Non-material amendments to planning permission reference 22/0649/FUL dated 22/12/23 for 'Demolition of existing buildings and structures, and redevelopment of the site including construction of 10no new buildings, ranging from 1 to 5 storeys (plus basement) in height and refurbishment of and extension to Bittacy Cottage - comprising 175 units of specialist older persons housing (Class C2) with ancillary communal facilities, 9no. residential dwellings (Class C3) and a community facility (Flexible Class F1/F2/E) alongside public open space, provision of car and cycle parking, associated landscaping and associated works.' Amendments include: Rationalisation of apartment types across all buildings on the Watch Tower House site, with consequential amendments to floorplans (including balconies), elevations and unit size mix (note that there is no change to the number of homes); Rationalisation of the basement, with associated changes to car parking layout and refuse stores; Adjustments to building levels and heights, with associated changes to detailing; Rationalisation of roof layouts and design
